title: Video Chunking Script Fails - File Not Found
context:
BUG: Video chunking automation fails when processing large video files for transcription.

REPRODUCTION STEPS:
1. User sends large video file (>400MB) via Telegram
2. Atlas attempts to chunk video using chunk_video_win.ts script
3. Script fails with "No video files found" error
4. Video transcription workflow blocked

ERROR OUTPUT:
No video files found in /workspaces/atlas/data/media/Personal
Script searched for: *.mp4, *.avi, *.mov, *.mkv, *.webm

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
- Script should locate downloaded video file
- Split into manageable chunks (<50MB each)
- Enable transcription of large video files

TECHNICAL INVESTIGATION NEEDED:
- Verify video download location from Telegram
- Check file format compatibility
- Ensure proper media directory structure
- Test with various video formats and sizes

IMPACT: Blocks transcription workflow for large video files, forcing manual chunking workaround.
